titles: A short epistle to Friends to keep in the power of God in their peaceable habitations over the troubles of the world.
author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
notes: Signed: Swarthmore, the 6th of the 12th moneth 1678. G.F. [i.e. George Fox].
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
keywords: Society of Friends --  England --  Pastoral letters and charges --  Early works to 1800.
